item.title: Snowing - Deltascape Source
item.dc:creator: @2xbladex2 2xbladex2
item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

Ok, I want to make my server snow temporarly since its nearing christmas and all. Here is what I currently have.

//Playercount at top of screen public void writePlayers() { setInterfaceWalkable(11877);// int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@gra@Players - " + players, 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Joescape", 6572); sendFrame126("", 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673}}} //setInterfaceWalkable(14600);//201 }
Although when you login you get a screen like this:
I’m pretty sure that login screen has something to do with the snow, because on login screen it’ll snow for like a mili-second. I don’t want to get rid of that screen, unless its the only possible way.

Read full topic
